title: NFL Around the League: AFC South - August 19th, 2013
itunes:title: NFL Around the League: AFC South - August 19th, 2013
description:
Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling bring you the latest headlines from around the league as well as break down the key takeaways from the Week 2 preseason action. The crew also previews the AFC South. Don’t miss Marc Sessler’s heartfelt apology to Cleveland Browns. Join the conversation and tweet us @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
